meta.title: {companyName} — Next Generation Cloud Services
meta.description: {companyName} — a reliable cloud platform for business. Virtual servers, GPU computing, secure storage, and 24/7 support.

hero.title: Next Generation Cloud Platform
hero.subtitle: Infrastructure Without Limits
hero.description: Scalable cloud resources for your business — from virtual machines to GPU clusters for artificial intelligence workloads.

tabs.heading: Full Spectrum of Cloud Services
tabs.description: Choose the right tools to build a reliable cloud infrastructure for your business

services.title: Virtual Machines
services.description: Flexible vCPU and RAM configurations from 1 to 96 cores for any workload.

services.title: GPU Servers
services.description: NVIDIA A100/H100 for high-performance computing and neural networks.

services.title: Dedicated Servers
services.description: Physical servers with full resource access and no noisy neighbors.

services.title: Containers
services.description: Kubernetes-based container orchestration with auto-scaling.

services.title: Managed Databases
services.description: PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB with automatic backups and high availability.

services.title: CI/CD Platform
services.description: Build and deployment automation with GitLab and GitHub integration.

services.title: Monitoring
services.description: Grafana and Prometheus — full observability for your infrastructure.

services.title: Serverless
services.description: Run functions without managing servers, pay only for actual usage.

services.title: Virtual Network (VPC)
services.description: Isolated private network with full control over topology and routing.

services.title: Load Balancer
services.description: L4/L7 balancing with SSL termination and automatic health checks.

services.title: CDN
services.description: Global content delivery with caching at 50+ nodes worldwide.

services.title: VPN & DDoS Protection
services.description: Site-to-Site VPN and attack mitigation up to 1 Tbps.

services.title: S3 Object Storage
services.description: Scalable storage with S3-compatible API and versioning support.

services.title: Block Disks
services.description: SSD and NVMe disks with up to 100,000 IOPS and data replication.

services.title: NFS File System
services.description: Shared file access across multiple instances with zero configuration.

services.title: Backup
services.description: Automated snapshots with configurable schedules and retention policies.

services.title: 24/7 Technical Support
services.description: Our engineering team is always ready to help — response within 15 minutes.

services.title: Dedicated Account Manager
services.description: A dedicated manager for enterprise clients and project guidance.

services.title: Knowledge Base
services.description: Extensive documentation, guides, and ready-made architectural solutions.

services.title: SLA 99.99%
services.description: Guaranteed availability level with financial accountability.

services.title: Data Center Type
services.description: Tier III data center with N+1 redundancy, fault-tolerant architecture, and 24/7 monitoring of all engineering systems.

services.title: Power
services.description: Two independent power feeds, industrial-grade UPS, and diesel generators for uninterrupted operation even during power grid failures.

services.title: Internet Channels
services.description: Multihoming with multiple independent backbone carriers and automatic traffic redistribution.

services.title: Hardware SLA
services.description: Guaranteed hardware replacement within 1 hour with round-the-clock on-site engineers at the data center.

gpuVms.heading: Next Generation GPU Virtual Machines
gpuVms.description: Access the most powerful NVIDIA GPUs without capital investment. Deploy GPU instances in minutes and pay only for actual usage time.
features: NVIDIA A100 and H100 Tensor Core GPU
Up to 8 GPUs in a single instance

machineLearning.heading: Infrastructure for Machine Learning
machineLearning.description: Accelerate model development and training with our cloud platform optimized for ML and AI workloads. Full tool stack from data preparation to production deployment.

gpuBenefits.heading: Benefits of GPU in the Cloud
gpuBenefits.description: Gain a competitive edge with cloud GPU computing

items.title: Maximum Performance
items.description: Process petabytes of data and train complex neural networks tens of times faster.

items.title: Flexible Scaling
items.description: Scale GPU count up or down based on your current workload demands.

items.title: Cost Savings
items.description: Eliminate expensive hardware — pay only for what you actually use.

items.title: Fast Start
items.description: Launch a GPU instance in 60 seconds and start computing immediately.

items.title: Reliability & Security
items.description: Isolated environment, data encryption, and compliance with security standards.

items.title: Global Infrastructure
items.description: Place your workloads closer to users at data centers around the world.

items.title: Compliance
items.description: GDPR, ISO 27001, and personal data localization requirements compliance.

items.title: Detailed Analytics
items.description: Real-time monitoring of GPU utilization, costs, and performance metrics.

itSolutions.heading: Modern IT Solutions for Your Business
itSolutions.description: We provide a full spectrum of cloud services that allow your company to focus on business growth while we take care of infrastructure management. From startups to enterprises — our platform is ready for any challenge.

cta.heading: Achieve Your Goals Together With Us
cta.description: Join hundreds of companies that already trust {companyName} with their IT infrastructure. Start your free trial today.

contact.heading: Contact Us
contact.subheading: Leave a request and we will get back to you shortly

notFound.heading: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.
